parameter.name: enrollmentType
parameter.description: When set, only return courses where the user is enrolled as this type. This argument is ignored if enrollment_role is given.

parameter.name: enrollmentRole
parameter.description: When set, only return courses where the user is enrolled with the specified course-level role.

parameter.name: include
parameter.description: Include optional details of each course being listed.

parameter.name: state
parameter.description: State(s) of the courses to be listed.

parameter.name: perPage
parameter.description: Number of entries to be returned in response to a list Request.

parameter.name: page
parameter.description: Number of the Page to return.
